articles.description: In the tightest of Ashes series, England's win at Headingley counts for little unless they win at Old Trafford and force a decider in the fifth Test, says Stephan Shemilt
articles.title: 'England drink again in the last chance saloon'

articles.description: The Ashes provides a gripping contest as England send a clear message to the world champions, but what does the future hold?
articles.title: 'Rollercoaster nobody wanted to get off stops, but what next?'

articles.description: England defender Lucy Bronze says the squad feels "very empowered" and wants to push standards higher in the women's game.
articles.title: Lionesses 'empowered' to improve standards - Bronze

articles.description: Jonas Vingegaard tightened his grip on the yellow jersey in the Tour de France after he blew away Tadej Pogacar in the individual time trial.
articles.title: Vingegaard closes in on title after time trial win

articles.description: Watch the moment England take the wicket of Jess Jonassen to complete a 2-1 series win by 69 runs on DLS, with Australia retaining the Ashes following and 8-8 draw the multi-format series.
articles.title: Moment: England celebrate ODI series win as Ashes drawn

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions will play a New Zealand and Australia invitational XV as part of their nine-match tour down under in 2025.
articles.title: Lions to play combined NZ-Australia XV on 2025 tour

articles.description: Tahnee Seagrave is a household name in downhill mountain biking. But a concussion suffered in a crash had long-lasting effects.
articles.title: 'Concussion made me feel like I was drowning'

articles.description: Watch the best of Nat Sciver-Brunt, who hit a superb 129 as England beat Australia by 69 runs to win the ODI series 2-1
articles.title: Sciver-Brunt inspires England to ODI series win

articles.description: Fifa president Gianni Infantino says he only wants to talk about positive things during the Women's World Cup when asked about issues such as gender pay disparity.
articles.title: Infantino only wants positive talk during World Cup

articles.description: England forward Marcus Rashford signs a deal to stay at Manchester United until 2028.
articles.title: Rashford signs new long-term Man Utd contract
